title: zuizui
author: zuizui
created_time: October 03, 2022, 03:42:56 AMLast edit: October 03, 2022, 09:42:13 AM by zuizui
content: このオークションは私自身の問題により一旦見直します、後日準備を整えてから再度出品を予定しています。入札いただいた方には申し訳ありません、写真や情報などを整えたのち再開します。

comments.author: doblezero
comments.body: My friend, good luck with the auction.next time try not to copy my text.if you believe it with your words it is more satisfying for you.

comments.author: zuizui
comments.body: My friend, my apologies. I didn't know how to do the auction or how to paste the images, so once I made a copy, I hope you'll forgive me as I've made some corrections regarding the information and such

comments.author: zuizui
comments.body: I apologize to anyone who bid on this item, this auction will be deleted tomorrow (as it cannot be deleted within 24 hours of posting). I am sorry that this happened due to a problem on my end.I will review the photos and auction details at a later date. Thank you.
